metadata.title: CVE-2015-2831 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in das_watchdog 0.9.0 allows local users to executearbitrary code with root privileges via a large string in the XAUTHORITYenvironment variable.

criterions.comment: das-watchdog: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
